availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: Madison Crawford Owens (Rockcastle County, Kentucky, farmer.)

body.p: Rockcastle County, Kentucky, farmer. Kentucky native. Son of Alfred Owens and Rebecca Owens. Married to Cecelia Owens Owens in Rockcastle County, Kentucky, on May 7, 1863. Father of Elizabeth Owens. Resident of Rockcastle County, Kentucky, in 1850. Farmer in Rockcastle County in 1860. Farmer in Rockcastle County in 1863.

ab.bibl:
Seventh Manuscript Census of the United States (1850), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Rockcastle County, Southern District, p. 162A.
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Rockcastle County, p. 490.
Ninth Manuscript Census of the United States (1870), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Rockcastle County, District 1, p. 25A.
Consolidated Lists of Civil War Draft Registration Records, Records of the Provost Marshal General's Bureau (Civil War), NARA RG 110, Rockcastle County, KY, June 1863, p. 68.
Kentucky Marriage Records, Madison County Courthouse, Richmond, Kentucky, Rockcastle County Marriages, Film 000907997.
Mount Vernon Signal (Mount Vernon, KY), March 26, 1920, p. 2.
"M Crawford 'Matt' Owens (1836-1920)," Find A Grave, Memorial 6971252, accessed October 13, 2023, https://www.findagrave.com/memorial/6971252.
